attributes.action: Set the date for General, Local, EU... elections as Thanksgiving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Moving every election to Thanksgiving [November] addresses the problem of non-voters 'corrupting' the electoral-process; handover January 1st following year

Summer-elections coincide with study, exams & vacations; contributing to first-past-the-post receiving [typically] 20% of the electorate

Winter-elections coincide with the mearest hint of a snowflake, cold & darkness

Spring too is marked by the cold, darkness & snow

Autumn being the 'best' season, Thanksgiving embraces USA-link, clearly the best date in the year; ditto fixed 4-year terms
